Author: _t1nk_
Text: Yes the left side thing is real. Also if I feel sick after eating after a fast I find laying on my back with my butt up against a wall and legs straight up really helps with the uncomfortable full stomach feeling.

Author: MuddyWalruss
Text: The constipated thing happens to me nearly everytime i eat a big meal. What i do to help it is using a hot water bottle and laying on my left side (apparently it's something to do with the digestion system and laying on the left side helps it)
